title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When performing the steps to reproduce and selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor should take a similar amount of time as closing and reopening the editor, which is approximately 8 seconds.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an editor on the file org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java in the project org.eclipse.swt.
2) Select the end of the first line and add a space to mark the file as dirty.
3) Click on the close box in the editor tab and choose 'No' when prompted to save changes.
4) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.

Notice the time it takes to perform the above steps.

Now, repeat steps 1 and 2 and select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.

Notice the time it takes to replace the contents of the window with the original.
